items.sentence: Have you seen Tom since he\'s shaved his head?
I had a fight with my older brother yesterday.
I remember my mother teaching me the alphabet.
Before Mary got married, she was much thinner.
Can you describe the man who took your wallet?
Can you give an exact report of what happened?
Can you tell me when the next bus will arrive?
Children are easily influenced by advertising.
Convincing Tom to do the right thing was hard.
Tom and Mary volunteered to clean up the park.
Tom asked Mary if he could borrow her bicycle.
Tom certainly appeared to be enjoying himself.
Tom committed crimes, but was never convicted.
Let\'s not forget the real reason we\'re here.
Tom is three months behind in paying his rent.
Tom is very highly strung and easily offended.
What prevented you from coming here yesterday?
What singers were popular when you were young?
What time was it when we entered the building?
What was the first word you learned in French?
